Tabla Usuarios

This component demonstrates fetching data from the server.

{{ auction.auction_id }} {{ auction.item_id }} {{ auction.auction_start_date }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Users, Items, Auctions } from '../models/models'; import { ApiService } from '../services/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-users', templateUrl: './fetch-users.component.html' }) export class FetchUsersComponent { public users: Users[] = []; public items: Items[] = []; public auctions: Auctions[] = []; constructor(private apiservice: ApiService) { this.apiservice.getUsers().subscribe(result => { this.users = result; }, err => console.error(err)); } }
